task.title: How to Clean the Machine
task.shortdesc: These instructions will show you show to clean the machine effectively and safely

prereq.p: Do not immerse the motor base in water
Do not clean any of the parts with abrasive cleaners or hard implements

context.p: Cleaning the machine should be done after every use of the machine to ensure users stay healthy and the machine is not damaged

step.cmd: Submerge the mixing arm and lid in warm soapy water
Wipe clean the motor base with damp cloth
Leave parts on dry towel for next user
